resources.string: Substratum needs to be installed for this app to do anything.
Andromeda needs to be installed for this app to do anything.
You have to make sure the above 3 conditions are met before AutoAndromeda can run
AutoAndromeda is good to go, and will bind Andromeda automatically on reboot.
AutoAndromeda success on last boot: Yes!
AutoAndromeda success on last boot: No :(
